title: Why has there been an abandoned" flat bed trailer with a generator on it for several years on Kent Ave off of Carolina Beach Road by Greenfield lake? Are there abandonment laws in Wilmington?"
text:
Here's a link about how local authorities deal with abandoned vehicles:



http://www.myreporter.com/2010/03/how-do-law-enforcement-officers-deal-with-abandoned-cars-on-the-side-of-the-road/
